bibl.title: The University of Michigan Papyrus Collection: Current Trends and Future Perspectives.
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I
bibl.note: I. Evolving Realities. - II. Evolving Notions: From "Text" Collections to "Meta-Text" Archives. - III. Research at the University of Michigan Papyrus Collection: 1. Past and Present; - 2. The Challenge of Karanis: Papyrology Meets Archaeology; - 3. Electronic Projects at Michigan; - 4. Current Research on Papyri. - IV. Epilogue. - Pp. 533-536: Appendix I. Transcript, translation and commentary of P. Mich. Inv. 6981 recto, col. i [by Tr.G. and Ludwig KOENEN]. Ptolemaic decrees on corn transportation, May 31, 196 B.C.?. From a mummy cartonnage purchased in 1982. - Pp. 536-537: Appendix II. Forthcoming publications of Hieratic and Hieroglyphic papyri.
